rows.label: tlk43320142_01_msg0001
rows.name:
After the stuff that happened, we
decided not to let the kids go out
to play without a grown-up on hand.

rows.label: tlk43320142_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I thought the kids would kick up a
fuss 'cos we'd be cramping their style.

rows.label: tlk43320142_01_msg0003
rows.name:
But, actually, they're stoked. They get
to see the Mercs at work, and it's a
real buzz for them.

rows.label: tlk43320142_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I can't shake the feeling he's bound
to get himself into trouble.
